word: G2639 - καταλέγω - katalégō - kat-al-eg'-o - Take into the number

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Take into the number
2. to narrate at length, recount, set forth
3. to set down in a list or register, to enroll
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2596 and G3004 (in its original meaning); to lay down, that is, (figuratively) to enrol: - take into the number.
